templates.title: Doctrine Volume Backup
templates.description: Backup Docker volumes locally or to any S3, WebDAV, Azure Blob Storage, Dropbox or SSH compatible storage.
templates.note: Remember to configure the remote storage using the configuration variables.

env.name: BACKUP_CRON_EXPRESSION
env.label: Backup frequency
env.description: The cron expression specifying how often backups should run.

env.name: BACKUP_RETENTION_DAYS
env.label: Backup retention days
env.description: When configured, any archives older than this value will be rotated.

templates.title: Homarr
templates.description: A simple, yet powerful dashboard for your server. This version exposes the application via Traefik.
templates.note: Attach the container to the Traefik network (do not expose any ports) and adjust the labels to match your system, particularly the domain name.
templates.name: homarr

templates.note: Attach the container to the Traefik network (do not expose any ports) and adjust the labels to match your system, particularly the domain name.
templates.name: mercure

templates.title: phpMyAdmin
templates.description: Web-based tool for managing MySQL and MariaDB databases. This version exposes the application via Traefik.
templates.note: Attach the container to the Traefik network (do not expose any ports) and adjust the labels to match your system, particularly the domain name, which should match the domain specified in PMA_ABSOLUTE_URI. Access the application at path /phpmyadmin of the configured domain.

env.name: PMA_HOST

env.description: Required address/host name of the MySQL server.

env.name: UPLOAD_LIMIT
env.label: Upload limit
env.description: Optional upload limit.

templates.title: Uptime Kuma

templates.note: Attach the container to the Traefik network (do not expose any ports) and adjust the labels to match your system, particularly the domain name. Access the application at the configured domain.

templates.title: Dozzle

env.name: DIUN_NOTIF_MAIL_TO

env.description: Separate multiple recipents with comma.

templates.title: BookStack (standalone)
templates.description: Platform for creating and organizing documentation, wikis, and knowledge bases. This version exposes the app via Traefik and comes bundled with MariaDB and phpMyAdmin.
templates.note: Generate the application key docker run -it --rm --entrypoint bash lscr.io/linuxserver/bookstack appkey. Access the application at the configured domain using the credentials admin@admin.com / password. Access phpMyAdmin at the path /phpmyadmin using the bookstack user or root, along with their respective configured passwords.
